00005 public class Patient implements Runnable{
00006 
00007    public static final int WATER = 0, MEDICINE = 1;
00008    public DBHandler dbh;
00009    
00010    public Patient(DBHandler db){
00011       this.dbh = db;
00012    }
00013 
00014    public static final int PENDING = 0, ASSIGNED = 1, SERVED = 2;
00015 
00016    public void addRequest(int req_id, int item, int pid){
00017       dbh.addRequest(req_id, pid, String.valueOf(item), String.valueOf(PENDING));
00018    }
00019 
00020    public void run() {
00021       int count=0;
00022       while(true){
00023          //receive request.
00024          int req = 0;   // ---4bit id--- | --- 4bit req ----
00025          int req_id = count;
00026          int item = req%16;
00027          int pid = req/16;
00028          addRequest(req_id, item, pid);
00029          count++;
00030       }
00031    }
